燕鸥属（sternum）(Sterna)大约30种，是最典型的种类，尾叉形，顶或冠黑色，体淡灰色。黑燕鸥(S. nigra,有时称黑浮鸥〔Chlidonias niger〕)体 …
称为腹板(Sternum)，两侧者则称为侧板(Steuron)。 蜜蜂有2对翅(Wing)，从胸部背板向两侧延伸，呈膜质、透明，翅面上布有许多由 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek sternon 'chest'

entry.def: Your sternum is the long flat bone which goes from your throat to the bottom of your ribs and to which your ribs are attached.

means.word_mean: 1. the flat bone that articulates with the clavicles and the first seven pairs of ribs
